web_snippets: Dr. Sammy founder and director of the Ramsey Research Foundation graduated with a Bachelor of Science in Entomology from Cornell University in 2011.
Sammy is a special breed of executive level personnel who has the uncanny ability to motivate and drive success in the organization that he manages.
Sammy Boussiba (Hebrew: סמי בוסיבה) is a professor emeritus at the French Associates Institute for Agriculture and Biotechnology of Drylands
